LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.Gauran: I am happily connected to a Gauranlen tree.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnectionDesired.stages.want_G: Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
Without a connection to a Gauranlen tree, I feel disconnected from nature.
In the past quadrum, we didn't destroy many trees at all. Harmony with the trees is the basic foundation for a good life.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.trees_disturbe: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed trees we shouldn't have. It might have been necessary, but it is still an occasion for sadness.
In the past quadrum, we have destroyed a lot of trees we shouldn't have. I don't think this was necessary.
In the past quadrum, we have destroyed many trees we shouldn't have. This crime was not necessary, but we did it anyways.
LanguageData.TreeDensityReduced.stages.trees_harmed.d: In the past quadrum, we have destroyed an inexcusable number of trees. We need to do so much better.
In the past quadrum, we have destroyed an inexcusably large number of trees. The guilt lays heavy upon us.
In the past quadrum, we have destroyed a very large number of trees. I can hear the leafy screams even now.
In the past quadrum, we have destroyed a horrific number of trees. We are the blight on this universe.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.amazing_trees.label: amazing trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.amazing_trees.descri: I am surrounded by several beautiful, massive trees. The glory of nature astounds me!
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.amazing_tree-0.label: amazing tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.amazing_tree-0.descr: I very recently saw a beautiful, massive tree - a physical seat of morality!
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.remarkable_trees.des: I am surrounded by a lush forest.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.amazing_tree-1.label: amazing tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.amazing_tree-1.descr: I recently saw a beautiful, massive tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.rich_forest.label: rich forest
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.rich_forest.descript: I was recently surrounded by a lush forest.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.full_trees.label: full trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.full_trees.descripti: I recently saw many full trees.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.mixed_trees.label: mixed trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.mixed_trees.descript: I recently saw a wide variety of trees.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.full_tree.label: full tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.full_tree.descriptio: I recently saw a full tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.mini_trees.label: mini trees
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.mini_trees.descripti: I recently saw plenty of miniature trees.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.mini_tree.label: mini tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.mini_tree.descriptio: I recently saw a miniature tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.no_tree-0.label: no tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.no_tree-0.descriptio: I haven't seen any trees in a while.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.no_tree-1.label: no tree
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.no_tree-1.descriptio: I miss seeing trees around me.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.trees_missed-0.label: trees missed
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.trees_missed-0.descr: It has been a while since I've seen a tree.
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.trees_missed-1.label: trees missed
LanguageData.TreesDesired.stages.trees_missed-1.descr: It has been too long since I've seen a tree.
It has been way too long since I've seen a tree!
